publicationStmt.publisher: Uppsala University, Department of linguistics and philology

msIdentifier.repository: Wroblewski Library of the Lithuanian Academy of Sciences in Vilniuse, Lithuania

msContents.summary: Translations of Biblical texts into North-Western Karaim: The Latter Prophets, The Twelve Minor Prophets, the Sifrei Emet (Psalms, Proverbs, Job), and the Five Megillot (Song of Songs, Ruth, Lamentations, Ecclesiastes, Esther)

ab.title: Ezekiel 19
ab.l: Da śeń ḱot́urǵuń qina avazy nasiĺari üśt́uńa Jiśraʾeĺniń.

Da ajtḥyn ńedir
anej aryslanka arasyna aryslanlarnyn jatadyr ortasynda igit́ aryslanlarnyn öśt́urd́u balalaryn.
Da öśt́u bir balalaryndan igit́ aryslanɣa boldu da üv́ŕańdi jyrtma jyrtuv adamny ašady.
Da yštyryldylar anar ḥanlyḥlar ėšitipĺar ki avlaryna ilińdi da keĺtirdiĺar any qaramaḥ byla jerińa Mićriniń.
Da ḱord́u ki ḥastalandy taspoldu umsunču da aldy birni balalaryndan igit́ aryslanɣa qojdu any.
Da üŕud́u ortasynda aryslanlarnyn igit́ aryslanɣa boldu da üv́ŕańdi jyrtma jyrtuv adamny ašady.
Da qyjnady tul qatynlaryn da šaharlaryn v́eŕań ėt́ti da adady jer da tolusu avazyndan öḱurḿaginiń.
Da b́erdiĺar anyn üśt́uńa avaz ḥanlyḥlar č́uv́ŕa kerḿańd́ań da jajdylar anyn üśt́uńa avlaryn avlaryna ilińdi.
Da b́erdiĺar any b́ek- ĺav́ orunda qaramaḥlar byla da keĺtirdiĺar any bijińa Bav́eĺniń da keĺ- tirdiĺar b́eklikĺard́a anyn üč́uń ki ėšitiĺḿagej avazy artyḥ šaharlarynda Jiśraʾeĺniń.
Anej śeniń Jiśraʾeĺ borlalyḥ kibik uqšašyjda suvlar qatyna ornatylɣan jajyladoɣon da butaḥlanadoɣon boldu ḱop suv- lardan.
Da boldular anar kip tajaḥlar tajaḥlary byla ėrkĺańuv́č́u- ĺarniń da bijik boldu turušu arasyna bazyḥ butaḥlarnyn da ḱoŕuńd́u bijikligińd́a ḱop butaḥlarynyn.
Da tašlandy qaḥyr byla jerǵa tašlandy da qadim jeli q uruttu jemišiń üźuĺd́uĺar da qurudular kip tajaɣy ot ört́adi any.
Da haligińa ornatylɣan midbarda pusta jerd́a da suvsaɣan.
Da čyḥty ot tajaɣyndan butaɣynyn jemišiń ört́adi da joɣedi an- da ḱuč́ kipligi tajaḥnyn ėrkĺańḿa qina ol da boldu qinaɣa.

app.note: F305-90: spelled qoruttu; a scribal error.
F305-90: spelled öźuĺd́uĺar; a scribal error.
